addLabeledSpinner

public static javax.swing.JSpinner addLabeledSpinner(java.awt.Container c,
                                                     java.lang.String label,
                                                     javax.swing.SpinnerModel model)
addLabeledSpinner 
public static JSpinner addLabeledSpinner(Container c,String label,SpinnerModel model)
Creates a JSpinner with the specified label text from the SpinnerModel and adds the JSpinner to the given Container.

Parameters:
c - - the container to add the spinner to
label - - the text which to add to the spinner
model - - the SpinnerModel to make the spinner from
Returns:
a JSpinner created from the SpinnerModel with the specified label text

createLabeledTextBox

public static javax.swing.JPanel createLabeledTextBox(java.lang.String label)
createLabeledTextBox 
public static JPanel createLabeledTextBox(String label)
Creates a JTextField with the specified text as a label appearing before the text field.
WARNING! text field is initially about 1 char long - fixing this bug now

Parameters:
label - - the text to appear in front of the text field
Returns:
a JPanel with the labeled text field as the only element

createDateRangePanel

public javax.swing.JPanel createDateRangePanel()
createDateRangePanel 
public JPanel createDateRangePanel()
Creates a JPanel containing two labeled date spinners labeled "To" and "From". Used to specify a specific date range. The default range is -10 years from today's date through today's date.

Returns:
a JPanel containing two date spinners used for specifying a date range

makeTextPanel

public static javax.swing.JPanel makeTextPanel(java.lang.String text)
makeTextPanel 
public static JPanel makeTextPanel(String text)
Creates a JPanel containing the given text placed in the center as the only component.

Parameters:
text - - the text to put on the panel
Returns:
a JPanel containing only the given text
